I heard that Watsuki based Kamiya Kaoru on Chiba Sanako. Is it possible that 
Shinguuji Sakura of Sakura Taisen was also based on her? Sakura is from 
Sendai, like Yamanami, and uses Hokushin Itto Ryu-- although her ultimate 
attack is rather unbelievable-- "Haja Kensei Ouka Hoshin" (Cherry Blossom 
Spirit Attack)...

--M.
